content:
Craft an item of type: jungle_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 37}]
thought: I need to craft jungle planks from the jungle log at slot 35 before I can craft the jungle fence gate. Therefore, I will move the jungle log to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 37}]
thought: I have crafted the jungle planks and now need to move them to an empty slot (eg., 11) so that I can craft the fence gate.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 37}]

thought: To craft a jungle fence gate, I need to place 2 sticks and 2 jungle planks in a vertical line in the crafting table. Therefore, I will first move one of the sticks to the top of the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 29}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 37}]
thought: Next, I will place one of the jungle planks to the right of the stick.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 29}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 37}]
thought: Now I will place another stick below the first stick.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 29}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 37}]
thought: Finally, I will place the last stick below the second stick.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 4 with quantity 1
